------
= [[size 150%]]{{**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-173 SCP-173]** - The Sculpture (The Original)}}[[/size]]
------
= //(Written by [[user Moto42]] and drawn by [[user winkwonkboi]].)//
@@ @@
[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[=]]
**__Artist's Commentary__**

Yeah, I thought I might as well jump on the bandwagon of artists redesigning and imagining their own version of the popular peanut 'round town. After about two decades, the image has finally been removed. Hats off to Izumi Kato — the creator behind Untitled 2004 — for letting the photo stay up for so long in the first place.

I rarely draw anything humanoid 'cause I'm shit at the anatomy, but I think it's at least decent. This may be influenced by other designs I've seen on the [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/peanut-gallery big gallery,] but regardless, I'm proud of what I drew. Pretty snazzy.

Love how the community banded together to wave goodbye to the iconic snapper and even organized an artist event to challenge their creativity. Seriously, great artwork, everyone. And hey, with that said, I might as well see it off too. Call this post another commemoration.

See you, peanut. Have fun in neck-snapping heaven!
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[=]]
+ //Farewell, Peanut! May Your __S__napping __C__ontinue __P__ersistently!//
+++ Check out my other 'doodles' [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/winkwonk-doodles here.]
@@ @@
